projects: [{'title': 'Case assessment of the public-private organisation Tasty Green Lifestyle Experience', 'date': {'start': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Tasty Green Lifestyle Experience (TGLE) is a public-private organisation that promotes the inclusion of young capital in the Triple Helix by placing them in the driver‚Äôs seat. In that way, they connect young capital with the government, educational institutes and the industry. TGLE commissioned nine students of the VU Athena Institute to perform an assessment of their current workings and to advise on improvements. Focus group discussions with stakeholders were conducted in order to gain insight in their underlying perspectives on young capital in the driver‚Äôs seat.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Marieke', 'last_name': 'Bak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Medical ethicist and researcher at Amsterdam UMC'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Koen', 'last_name': 'van Wermeskerken', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Adviseur Zorgadministratie bij HVO-Querido'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sigrid', 'last_name': 'Troelstra', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Researcher at Trimbos-institute'}, {'type': 'nonStandardizedContributor', 'first_name': None, 'last_name': None, 'name': 'Maaike den Heijer', 'headline': None}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Nadine', 'last_name': 'Gebara', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Strategic Advisor / Project Manager'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Ky-Lie', 'last_name': 'Tan', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Integrative medical researcher '}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Marinka', 'last_name': 'Sybesma', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Associate Manager Technology - Financial Services bij Accenture'}]}, {'title': 'Responsible Research and Innovation within\tiGEM: Science with\tsociety?', 'date': {'start': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 10, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}}, 'description': 'Sustainability and societal relevance are being increasingly acknowledged as essential to research and innovation. This has been framed from a policy perspective in the term ‚ÄòResponsible Research and Innovation‚Äô (RRI). In the Netherlands, the Rathenau Institute for Research and Debate on Science & Technology is engaged in this topic. The Rathenau Institute commissioned eleven students of VU University to research RRI within the iGEM student competition. In this competition, teams of later-stage students in synthetic biology create a new biological system in 6 months. Important in this is that the projects do not only focus on technical work, but instead the students also learn about the impact of their innovation. The aim of our study was to gain insights in the current practices of RRI within the iGEM student competition. For this, we conducted a literature study and ten semi-structured interviews with members, students, supervisors, and others, of the iGEM- community.', 'contributors': [{'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Marieke', 'last_name': 'Bak', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Medical ethicist and researcher at Amsterdam UMC'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Omar', 'last_name': 'Osmani', 'name': None, 'headline': 'CMD | Senior Medical Affairs Scientist | Amyloidosis | Science | Improving Healthcare | üî¨üí°üß¨'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Sven', 'last_name': 'van Ewijk üë®\u200düíª', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Frontend Developer at NPO'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Brian', 'last_name': 'Tielrooij', 'name': None, 'headline': 'Project Manager Implementations, Pacmed'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'Neil', 'last_name': 'Mutsaers', 'name': None, 'headline': 'QA Engineer at Formitable üë®\u200düç≥'}, {'type': 'standardizedContributor', 'first_name': 'G√ºven', 'last_name': 'Alarslan', 'name': None, 'headline': 'PhD Candidate bij Wageningen University & Research'}]}]
